meanings.sent1: She kept mismeasuring the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The tailor realized he was mismeasuring the length of the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The mismeasuring of time led to a comical mix-up in their schedules.
meanings.sent4: His mismeasuring of distances made him feel lost in the vast forest.
meanings.sent5: Mismeasuring the temperature caused the experiment to fail miserably.

meanings.definition: The act of measuring something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The mismeasuring of the room's dimensions resulted in a furniture mismatch.
meanings.sent2: Her repeated mismeasuring of the ingredients led to a ruined cake.
meanings.sent3: The mismeasuring of the building's height made for a funny story at the construction site.
meanings.sent4: The mismeasuring of weights in the gym class was like a comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The mismeasuring of the map's scale caused them to get lost in the city.
